Description: Pick up the cup and and place it at the base of the coffee machine. Press the button to activate the coffee machine. Make sure that the coffee pours into the cup.

Pick up the dirty plates and bowls and put them into the sinkBasin. Find the soap bottle and the kitchen sponge. Squeeze some soap onto the sponge and rub the sponge on the dirty plates and bowls. Turn on the faucet to rinse the dishes and bowls.
Pick up the knife and the apple. Use the knife to slice the apple.
Pick up the loaf of bread and a knife. Use the knife to slice the bread. Pick up the bread slice and put it into the toaster. Switch on the toaster and toast for 5 minutes.
Pick up a frying Pan and place it on the GasBurner. Turn the stove knob to heat the Pan. Pick up the egg, and break it over the Frying Pan.

Pick up the Pot, go to the sinkBasin and turn the faucet to fill the Pot with water. Take the filled pot of water and place it on the GasBurner. Turn the stoveKnob and heat up the water in the pot. Take a Tomato, and place it in the boiling water. Stir the contents of the pot with a ladle.

Pick up the Pot, go to the sinkBasin and turn the faucet to fill the Pot with water. Take the filled pot of water and place it on the GasBurner. Turn the stoveKnob and heat up the water in the pot. Take a lettuce, and place it in the boiling water. Stir the contents of the pot with a ladle.
Pick up the Pot, go to the sinkBasin and turn the faucet to fill the Pot with water. Take the filled pot of water and place it on the GasBurner. Turn the stoveKnob and heat up the water in the pot.
Pick up the cracked egg and drop it into the bin.
Open the fridge and take out everything inside of it.
Find the potato, then find a kife, then cut the potato into slices. Find the microwave and put the sliced potato into it and microwave the sliced potato.
Find the wineBottle and a cup. Open the winebottle and pour wine into the cup.
Find all food items that are not in the fridge, put them in the fridge.
Find a cup, open faucet and fill the cup with water.
Find a potato and a pot. Fill the pot with water, put the pot onto a stove. Turn the knob of the stove to on. Bring the water to boil and boil the potato.
Find unused apple slices, throw them into a bin.
Find all forks and knives, put them into the drawer.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_13_1
Description: Find a cup, pour coffee into the cup.
FInd the sink, pour the water from the pot into the sink.
Find the light switch, turn the switch to the off position.
Find the laptop on the coffee table. Turn the laptop on.
Find the remote. Use the remote to turn on the television. Watch the television.

Task: Check the timing on the watch_203_1
Description: Find the watch and look at the time on it.
Find the box and find the cell phone and the newspaper. Place the cell phone and the newspaper in the box.
Find the used tissue box. Take the used tissue box and place it in the bin.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_203_1
Description: Find the table lamp. Use the light switch of the table lamp to trun it off.
Find the cell phone. Pick it up and smash it against the end table until the screen is cracked.
Pick up the phone and make a phone call.
take all items on the sofa and place them on the arm chair.
Find the book and open it. Begin reading the book.
